sourcesContent:
import {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import './App.css'; import { MDBCol, MDBContainer, MDBRow, MDBCard, MDBCardText, MDBCardBody, MDBCardImage, MDBCardHeader, MDBBtn, MDBListGroup, MDBListGroupItem, MDBIcon, MDBModal, MDBModalDialog, MDBModalContent, MDBModalHeader, MDBModalBody, MDBModalTitle, MDBModalFooter, MDBDropdown, MDBDropdownItem, MDBDropdownMenu, MDBDropdownToggle, MDBTable, MDBTableHead, MDBTableBody, MDBNavbar, MDBRadio } from 'mdb-react-ui-kit'; function App() { const [roleSettingsModal, setRoleSettingsModal] = useState(false); const [users, setUsers] = useState([]); const [userId, setUserId] = useState("@admin"); const toggleOpenSettings = () => setRoleSettingsModal(!roleSettingsModal); const handleSwitchRole = (id : string) => setUserId(id); useEffect(() => { fetch("http://localhost:5000/get_users").then( res => res.json() ).then( data => { setUsers(data) } ); }, []) return (
{/* Modal with settings */} Редактировать права доступа User Edit Copy Read Admin 🗑 Moderator 🗑 User 🗑 Save changes {/* Navigation bar */} Юзер { users.map((id : string) => { return handleSwitchRole(id as string)}> {id} }) } {/* Админ Модератор Пользователь */} toggleOpenSettings()}>Изменить права доступа {/* Main content */} {/* Card for profile avatar and actions */}

Admin

 {/* Card with imoprtant selected info */} Информация о пользователе 1 2 3 Full Name Johnatan Smith
Email example@example.com
Phone (097) 234-5678
Mobile (098) 765-4321
Address Bay Area, San Francisco, CA {/* Card for choosing object in list for viewving info */} Твои привилегии Редактирование
Чтение
); } export default App;
